content: 1 tanaticrochet crochet pattern heart of ukraine tanaticrochet © 2022 all rights reserved for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sell or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern tatiana kucherovska 2 abbreviations single_crochet - single_crochet chain chain increase increase decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es x …… - repeat the instructions in between the brackets for x the indicated number of times recommendations for you  of course you can choose other yarns the choice of yarn is completely up to you and your personal taste  it would be wise to use a stitch marker and place it in the first stitch of each round to mark the beginning of it  you can easily sew the toy together by leaving a long tail of yarn on each piece  before you sew a part use some pins to perfectly place size 7*7 cm 3*3 in if using sport weight yarn sport 12 the part in the right place wpi 2 fine skill level beginner copyright notice material this pattern is the intellectual property of tatiana  yarn yarnart jeans blue and yellow 55% cotton / kucherovska tanaticrochet and intended only for 45% acrylic personal use all rights reserved when publishing photos  hook 2 25 mm b of the wares on the internet or sale of the products made on  soft stuffing basis of this master-class please specify the author  scissors tatiana kucherovska  pins for sewing parts at the right spot tanaticrochet  needle for sewing let s start tanaticrochet © 2022 all rights reserved for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sell or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern tatiana kucherovska 3 1 round blue yarn sts crochet two part 1 6 single_crochet into a magic loop 6 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch x 6 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 4-5 18 single_crochet 2 round 18 leave a thread to sew a hole between the parts cut the thread crochet second part repeating rounds 1-5 do not cut the yarn crochet the 2 parts together 6 work 9 single_crochet attach the first part 18 single_crochet 36 return to the second part and 2 crochet 9 single_crochet pic 1 7-8 36 single_crochet 2 round 36 9 change color to yellow 36 single_crochet 36 sew the hole between the parts pic 2 10 4 single_crochet decrease x 6 30 11 30 single_crochet 30 12 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 24 13 24 single_crochet 24 gradually add a soft filler pic 3 14 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 15 18 single_crochet 18 3 16 1 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 17 12 single_crochet 12 18 decrease x 6 close the hole
